org.openntf.formula

Class FormulaParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openntf.formula.FormulaParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtFormulaParserImpl

    public abstract class FormulaParser
extends Object
    This class adds additonal functionality to the AtFormulaParserImpl (which is auto generated).
    Author:
    Roland Praml, Foconis AG

      • reset

        public void reset()
        If you parse multiple formulas, you should call "reset" to clear predefined formulas!

      • getFunctionLC

        public Function getFunctionLC(String funcName)
        Querys the functionFactory for a function. You can declare custom functions. These functions overrides implemented functions (if it is not an AST-Function)
        Parameters:
        funcName - the functionName (lowercase)
        Returns:
        the function or null

      • declareFunction

        public void declareFunction(Function func)
        Declares a new function. This mehtod is called by the @Function(methodDecl ; [variables]) formula
        Parameters:
        func - the function to declare

      • parse

        public final ASTNode parse(Reader reader,
                           boolean useFocFormula)
                    throws FormulaParseException
        Parses the given formoula
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader where the formula is read
        useFocFormula - parses the formula in a special mode needed by Foconis. (You can inline formulas in normal text)
        Returns:
        an AST-node that can be evaluated
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the formula contains errors
        FormulaParseException
